name: Webliad
description:
Welcome to Webliad, a fanmade spin-off sequel thingy of Snailiad!

This fangame brings Snaily into a whole new land after the retirement of the sun snail.

The game is a metroidvania just like the original but with mmorpg elements such as leveling, equipment and raredrops!

Will you be able to find all your friends and become the new sun snail? It's all up to you!
